definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: evening, orig. sunset, and hence perh. ´[[לְעֵת ע]] at the time of sunset † Ge 8:11 (J), Ge 24:11 (J; ‖[[לְעֵת חֵאת]] [[הַשּׁׂאֲבׂת]]), 2Sa 11:2, Is 17:14 and (of the day of ´[[י]]) Zec 14:7, ´[[עֵת הָע]] Jos 8:29 (JE) †; usu. ´[[ע]] alone = time of sunset, evening: ´[[בָּע]] in the evening Ge 19:1 (J), Ge 29:23 (E), Ex 12:18 (P), De 16:6 (+ [[שֶׁמֶשׁ כְּבוֹא]]), 1Ki 22:35 (cf. ‖ 2Ch 18:34 where + [[לְעֵת בּוֹא]] [[הַשֶּׁמֶשׁ]]) + 20 t. + ´[[בָּע]]([[־]])[[בָּע]] 2Ch 13:11, 2Ch 13:11 = every evening; ´[[לָע]] at evening only late: † 1Ch 16:40, 1Ch 23:30, 2Ch 2:3, Ezr 3:3, Ps 59:7, Ps 59:15, Ps 90:6, Ec 11:6 †; ´[[לִפְנוֹת ע]] at the turn of evening † Ge 24:63 (J), De 23:12; ´[[ע]] as adv. acc. Ec 16:6 (P), Ps 55:18; as marking duration of impurity, in phr. ´[[עַד־הָע]] Le 11:24 + 30 t. P + Le 22:6 (H); of Day of Atonement ´[[מֵע]] ´[[עַד־ע]] Le 23:32 (P).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: du. in phrase (only P) [[בֵּין]] [[הָעַרְבַּיִם]] between the two evenings, i.e. prob. between sunset and dark (v. Thes [various views fully given]; otherwise Di:Ex 12:6; on form as poss. only expanded pl. v. Ges:§ 88 c), † Ex 12:6, Ex 16:12, Ex 29:39, Ex 29:41, Ex 30:8, Le 23:5, Nu 9:3, Nu 9:5, Nu 9:11, Nu 28:4, Nu 28:8 †.

definitions.title: 1 d, e. 2.
definitions.body: (late poet.) = night, [[עָָרֶב]] Job 7:4; cf. [[בְּנֶשֶׁף בְּעֶרֶב יוֹם]] Pr 7:9 (‖[[בְּאִישׁוֹן לַיְלָה וִאֲפֵלָה]]).
